Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.name: popViewController(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.abstract: This method removes the top view controller from the stack and makes the new top of the stack the active view controller. If the view controller at the top of the stack is the root view controller, this method does nothing. In other words, you cannot pop the last item on the stack.

Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.name: popToRootViewController(animated:completion:)
Extensions/UINavigationController.html#/.abstract: Pops all the view controllers on the stack except the root view controller and updates the display.
